protocol://host:port/path/to/api protocol://host:port/path/to/cert Fetched from For example: https://my-instance:443/ovirt-engine/api name@domain password Username Password Admin Privilege Valid for hostnames (comma separated) Tells oVirt if the user has admin privileges.
